fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Mainly transport-related policies e.g. related to delivering sustainable low-emission mobility
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Lubrizol Additives’ Mission is to be a global specialty chemical company that enables transportation and industrial equipment to work better, last longer and minimise environmental impact. Hazelwood is the European Technical Centre for Lubrizol Additives, developing essential chemistry that enhances the performance properties of lubricants and fuels. It is 
home to over 300 employees in various functions, including business leadership, marketing, research and development, and chemical and mechanical testing.
